title: FitTrack: Mobile Application
description: A comprehensive mobile health interface focused on biometric data visualization, workout tracking, and personalized wellness goal setting with AI integration.

title: Dementra: AI-Powered Smart Anklet & Dementia Care System
description: AI-Powered Dementia Safety & Care. Real-time GPS tracking and health monitoring paired with a smart anklet concept.

title: LIKHALOKAL: Tuklas, Kultura, Kabuhayan
description: Promoting local products and tourism discovery in Talisay and Vinzons to support community livelihood.

title: HACKADEMY
description: Cybersecurity awareness platform making online safety and digital privacy education accessible to everyone.

title: BEST IN PITCH AWARD
description: Awarded at the CNSC CCMS Pitching Event Expo for excellence in project presentation and technical innovation.

title: TEAM DEMENTRA
description: Official Certification of Finalists for the National DAP, recognizing the Dementra project on a national scale.
